sentences.sContent: Punks, soldiers, hippies, and Sumo wrestlers all have distinct hair styles, peculiar to their group.
sentences.sCn: 朋克摇滚歌手、士兵、嬉皮士和相扑手都留着他们那个群体特有的独特发型。

synos.tran: 特殊的；独特的；奇怪的；罕见的

phrases.pCn: n. 旧时美国南部的黑奴制度

words.tran: 特别；尤其；古怪地；奇怪地

trans.tranOther: If something is peculiar to a particular thing, person, or situation, it belongs or relates only to that thing, person, or situation
